# PATHFINDER-CLASS EXPEDITION SHUTTLE
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 2-4
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] AME
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] Yes
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
"Once a scout ship serving with the Nanotrasen Marine Expeditionary Forces, this now decommissioned and refurbished expedition-capable ship can be yours!"
# Tips on running KC Pathfinder shuttles - Optimal Target Power (kW) for the generator unit is 27 [bold]kW[/bold]. If you've added additional machines, check both APC units to see shuttle's power draw and adjust generator Target Power accordingly. For more general info on power grid see guidebook article [textlink="Power" link="Power"]. - There are two buttons in the cockpit: the one with a yellow and black frame controls the window shutters, toggling all shutters throughout the shuttle except for the ones in the dorms and those over the exterior airlocks by the docks. The button with the gray frame controls the thrusters. - For basics of [color=#a4885c]shuttle piloting[/color] see [textlink="Piloting" link="Piloting"]. - For basics of [color=#a4885c]cargo hauling[/color] see [textlink="Cargo Hauling" link="CargoHauling"].
